headlines.description: Jason Robertson netted his 33rd goal of the season, Jake Oettinger finished with 34 saves, and the Dallas Stars clinched a playoff spot in with a 5-1 victory over the Seattle Kraken on Saturday night.
headlines.shortLinkText: Robertson, Oettinger lead Stars to 5-1 playoff-clinching victory over Kraken
